alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 4:29PM CDT until May 31 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Southeastern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Western Custer County in western Oklahoma... Western Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Putnam to 6 miles northeast of Sayre, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Hammon, Canute, Leedey, Butler, Moorewood, Foss Reservoir, Berlin and Stafford. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Roger Mills; Washita
